explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the adoption of renewable energy technology on farms, examining factors such as entrepreneurial orientation, farmer perception, and government policies. The methodologies used include logistic regression, data envelopment analysis, and propensity score matching, which are statistical and econometric techniques rather than machine learning or deep learning methods. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, neural networks, or large language models are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract.
